sentence.Network_en: She is unsparing in her criticism.
Mr. Hopkins has been unsparing of his own health.
sentence.Network_cn: 霍普金斯先生曾经不惜牺牲他自己的健康.

sentence.Network_en: Nijinsky was unsparing in his demands for perfection.
sentence.Network_cn: 尼任斯基对演技精益求精一丝不苟.
